name: JST Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: Ecommerce Website Development and Wordpress Master
description:
We are an techie-promoted web development and web designing company.
Managed and operated by coding and design pros, we help you stand head and shoulders higher than your competitors. we have never compromised on the quality and the services provided to the customer. We believe in keeping the customers happy and providing them with products at a very competent price. 
Every member of our team is handpicked after being put through grueling coding/designing and testing sessions.
We have created many ecommerce and general websites, social media apps, WordPress Plugins, and many more.
Our Expertise In:
Wordpress, Wordpress Plugin, Wordpress Theme, Woocommerce, Magento, Opencart, Codeigniter, Prestashop. Yii, Cake PHP, Bootstrap, Photoshop etc.
